Method Detail

init

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE init(android.content.Context context,
                                    java.lang.String libraryPath,
                                    VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_PLAYER_ENGINE playEngineType,
                                    java.lang.Object initParam,
                                    int initParamFlag)
Initialize a player instance. 
This function must be called first to start a session.

Parameters:
context - [in]Current context.
libraryPath - [in]Full path name of package, such as /data/data/packagename/lib/.
playEngineType - [in]Refer to VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_PLAYER_ENGINE.
initParam - [in]The value is NULL now.
initParamFlag - [in]The value is 0 now.
Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful. NOTE: argument list will change after incorporating the new dlopen() approach.

destroy

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE destroy()
Destroy a player instance. 
This function must be called last to close a session.

Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful .

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE setView(android.view.SurfaceView sv)
Set surface view for video playback

Parameters:
sv - [in] Current SurfaceView. .
Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful.

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE setViewSize(int width,
                                           int height)
Set surface view size

Parameters:

height - [in] Surface view height.
Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful.

open

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE open(java.lang.String url,
                                    VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_SOURCE_FLAG flag,
                                    VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_SOURCE_FORMAT type,
                                    VOOSMPInitParam initParam,
                                    int initParamFlag)
Open media source

Parameters:
url - [in] Source file description (e.g. an URL or a file descriptor, etc.).
flag - [in] The flag for opening media source. Refer to VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_SOURCE_FLAG. Currently the value should be VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_SOURCE_FLAG.VO_OSMP_FLAG_SOURCE_OPEN_SYNC
type - [in] Indicates the source forma;, default is VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_SOURCE_FORMAT.VO_OSMP_SRC_AUTO_DETECT.
initParam - [in] VOOSMPInitParam type, according to initParamFlag, indicate which field is valid. If (initParamFlag & VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_INIT_PARAM_FLAG.VO_OSMP_FLAG_INIT_ACTUAL_FILE_SIZE) > 0, VOOSMPInitParam.getFileSize() should get a File size.
initParamFlag - [in] refer to VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_INIT_PARAM_FLAG, you can use "|" input several parameter at same time.
Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful.

close

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE close()
Close data source. Framework is still available

Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful.

setPosition

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE setPosition(long msec)
Seek operation

Parameters:
msec - [in] the position to seek to.
Returns:
Position after seek operation. Returns -1 if seek failed.

getPosition

long getPosition()
Get current playback position

Returns:
Position, -1 if get failed.

getDuration

long getDuration()
Get duration of the stream

Returns:
Current stream duration. Returns 0 if source is a live streams.

setVolume

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE setVolume(float volume)
Set playback volume

Parameters:
volume - [in] audio channel volume. A value of 0.0f indicates silence; . A value of 1.0f indicates no attenuation.
Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful.

suspend

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE suspend(boolean keepAudio)
Suspend player 
The application layer should invoke this method on receiving a notification of moving to background.

Parameters:
keepAudio - [in] Keep/pause audio. true for continuing to play audio, false to pause both video and audio.
Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful; error code if not.

resume

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE resume(android.view.SurfaceView sv)
Resume player 
The application layer should invoke this method on receiving a notification of moving to foreground.

Parameters:
sv - [in] Current SurfaceView.
Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful; error code if not.

setSurfaceChangeFinished

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE setSurfaceChangeFinished()
Notify the player that surface changed event has been completed and video rendering can be started. This method is called when receiving SurfaceHolder.SurfaceChanged(). When surface is changing, video rendering is suspended until this API is called. It will time out after 200ms if the API is not called, and video rendering will continue.

Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful.

setVideoAspectRatio

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE setVideoAspectRatio(VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_ASPECT_RATIO ar)
Set aspect ratio of video

Parameters:
ar - [in] Refer to VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_ASPECT_RATIO. VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful; error code if not.

redrawVideo

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE redrawVideo()
Redraw the video in render This function is not applicable on Android

Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful.

getPlayerStatus

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_STATUS getPlayerStatus()
Get player status

Returns:
Player status. Please refer to VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_STATUS.

canBePaused

boolean canBePaused()
Check if the stream can be paused

Returns:
true for a VOD, false for a live stream with no DVR-like features enabled.

startAnalyticsNotification

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE startAnalyticsNotification(int interval,
                                                          VOOSMPAnalyticsFilter filter)
Start periodic analytics data notification

Parameters:
interval - [in] Time interval, between two analytics data notifications. In each notification, analytics data of past "interval" ms is returned.
filter - [in] Filters specified as an VOOSMPAnalyticsFilter object which is applied to cached analytic data before being returned.
Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful.

stopAnalyticsNotification

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE stopAnalyticsNotification()
Stop periodic analytics data notification

Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful.

getAnalytics

VOOSMPAnalyticsInfo getAnalytics(VOOSMPAnalyticsFilter filter)
Get current analytics data

Parameters:
filter - [in] filters specified as an VOOSMPAnalyticsFilter object which is applied to cached analytic data before being returned.
Returns:
a VOOSMPAnalyticsInfo object if successful or null if failed.

setOnEventListener

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE setOnEventListener(VOCommonPlayerListener instance)
Set onEventListener instance

Parameters:
instance - [in] Event listener instance.
Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful.
